Package edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list

Class AbstractList<E>

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list.AbstractList<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements stored in the list
All Implemented Interfaces:
List<E>, Iterable<E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayBasedList, SinglyLinkedList
public abstract class AbstractList<E> extends Object implements List<E>
A skeletal implementation of the List abstract data type. This class provides implementation for common methods that can be implemented the same no matter what specific type of concrete data structure is used to implement the list abstract data type.
Author:
Dr. King, Jeremiah Knizley
